name: spotify-agent
description: AI-powered Spotify control agent with auto-queue functionality
author: Spotify Agent Developer

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run auth && ts-node src/index.ts --no-trace
scripts.dev:trace: npm run build && npm run auth && ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run auth && ts-node src/index.ts -d
scripts.debug:no-trace: npm run build && npm run auth && ts-node src/index.ts -d --no-trace
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run auth && node dist/index.js
scripts.auth: cd ../spotify-mcp-server && npm run auth && npm run build && cd ../spotify-agent
scripts.eval: npm run build && node dist/evaluations/cli.js evaluate-version --current
scripts.eval:all: npm run build && node dist/evaluations/cli.js evaluate-all
scripts.eval:all-versions: npm run build && node dist/evaluations/cli.js evaluate-all-versions
scripts.eval:compare: npm run build && node dist/evaluations/cli.js compare-versions
scripts.eval:summary: npm run build && node dist/evaluations/cli.js summary
